name: Messages to Mars
description:
Controls:

A/D/Analog Stick = Left and Right

Space/Gamepad X = Interact
E/ Gamepad O = Interact

The first day on your new job as a Postman on Mars, what could go wrong?

My first Game Jam project, this one done for Lost Relic Games' first Game Jam!

A relaxing 2D Platformer with a Space Western style and art from SHB.
